description: Gio is a dragon from the ISDA who is assigned to be Kazuki Tachibana`s "partner" after Kazuki successfully resonated with Gio`s dragon egg form. However, despite being Kazuki`s partner, Gio does not take orders from him, showing more concern for Toa, whom he states he was born to protect. Due to this, he is considered to be a failed experiment.
name: Gio
